# my github gists

- [**Get-ContextMenu.ps1**](https://gist.github.com/danielpancake/59744862c928689bd0514d2fcadd4586)
Retrieves shell verbs and context menu handlers registered for a specific file extension in Windows

- [**gm-multikey-dict.gml**](https://gist.github.com/danielpancake/be6de9cc0a7ecb6271079f2cfb83e368)
Nested dictionary implementation that stores and retrieves values using multiple keys as a hierarchical path

- [**post_run_step.bat**](https://gist.github.com/danielpancake/b443bc6128fa2dc14cfc1c27a5d34db5)
Automatically creates backups of a GameMaker project by copying it to the current userâ€™s Documents/GameMakerBackups folder

- [**srt-resync.hs**](https://gist.github.com/danielpancake/995bd2aea2f47080cb91a627994d9ad1)
Stretch SRT subtitles
